final_consolidated_report.title: Landing Page Template Specification - Final Consolidated Report
final_consolidated_report.executive_summary: This final consolidated report completes all validation, correction, and remediation phases for the professional landing page template. The specification now includes: (1) fully validated persona content within word limits, (2) explicit numbered i18n keys replacing all templates, (3) complete CMS schema with validation rules, (4) comprehensive asset remediation plans for 7 missing assets, and (5) production-ready JSON schema with all required sections. All constraints from Phases 1-3 have been enforced, resulting in a handoff-ready specification for design, development, and content teams.

3_wireframe.validation: All i18n keys updated to numbered format

4_i18n_keys.details: All templates replaced with numbered keys

5_cms_schema.media_fields: All include alt_text_key and focal_point metadata

6_assets.remediation: Delivery recommendations (7-14 days) for design team

7_data_types.corrections: Animation durations as numbers (not strings), file sizes as bytes

8_component_structure.note: Component definitions retain template format for CMS; instances use numbered keys
